h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Battle - Commander Beetle
content: He can also adopt a ready stance and expel projectiles all around him. They'll fly about like angry gnats and threaten to deal several hits, but these are the kind of projectiles you can easily deflect with your staff spin.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Temple_of_Yellow_Flowers_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Temple of Yellow Flowers Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Battle - Commander Beetle'.
The content is as follows:
He can also adopt a ready stance and expel projectiles all around him. They'll fly about like angry gnats and threaten to deal several hits, but these are the kind of projectiles you can easily deflect with your staff spin.
